ca.uhn.fhir.jpa.dao

Class SearchBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uhn.fhir.jpa.dao.SearchBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISearchBuilder

    @Component
 @Scope(value="prototype")
public class SearchBuilder
extends Object
implements ISearchBuilder
    The SearchBuilder is responsible for actually forming the SQL query that handles searches for resources
